amendment.description: An amendment numbered 19, printed in Part B of House Report 117-366 to add the text of the Payment Choice Act, which protects the right to pay in cash at all retail establishments for transactions under $2,000.
amendment.purpose: Amendment adds the text of the Payment Choice Act to the bill, which protects the right to pay in cash at all retail establishments for transactions under $2,000.
